name: An Autumn Day
description:
A gentle autumn day in the park.

Play with WASD or Arrow keys. R to reload.

A sort of spinoff of https://haoliao.itch.io/there-is-a-beautiful-star and https://haoliao.itch.io/i-want-to-hear-that-again.
Features sprites from both.

Music
Yang Hee-eun - Autumn Morning

Sound
https://freesound.org/people/Porphyr/sounds/209339/

Made in one week for Hao in Prototype Studio at the NYUGC.
